channel.title: Vim on OuterRealm
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on OuterRealm

item.title: Mastering Vim: From Basics to Power User
item.description: Vim is a legendary text editor that has stood the test of time. Whether you’re writing code, editing configuration files, or drafting a quick note, Vim provides a fast, efficient, and highly customizable editing experience — once you get past the learning curve.
